content: As an owner/admin you can view and manage all API keys in this {{productName}}.

comment.text: This translation key is used for describing API keys management features within a portal settings page. It will be displayed to owners/admins as a tooltip or description in the UI. The context suggests it appears on a page related to developer tools and settings.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation includes the English abbreviation "API" within the Arabic text. This is unconventional and breaks the flow. It's preferable to translate 'API' or use a transliteration that is commonly understood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'API' to its functional meaning, such as 'واجهات برمجة التطبيقات' (waajihaat barmajat al-tatbiqaat) or using a common transliteration like 'إيه بي آي' ('A.B.I.') within parentheses after 'مفاتيح' (mafaatih).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon and space after '{{productName}}' are unnecessary and disrupt the flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omistajana/pääkäyttäjänä voit katsella ja hallita kaikkia API-avaimia tässä {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a hyphenated dash (-). It's generally preferred to use a non-breaking space ( ) or a regular space for better readability, especially when referencing a product name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Որպես սեփականատեր/ադմին՝ կարող եք դիտել և կառավարել բոլոր API բանալիները այս {{productName}} ում:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation uses 'あなた' (anata) which can sound overly direct and less professional, especially when addressing users in a platform setting. A more appropriate pronoun or omission is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing 'あなた' or replacing it with a more formal address like 'こちら' (kochira) or simply starting the sentence directly (e.g., 'この {{productName}} 内のすべての API キーを表示および管理できます。')

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "owner/admin" is not ideal. "소유자/관리자" directly translates to 'owner/manager,' which is functionally correct but sounds less natural in this context. It's more common to use terms implying administrative privilege.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: API 키 관리자는 이 {{productName}}의 모든 API 키를 확인 및 관리할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "API 키 소유자/관리자" is a bit clunky. Combining the role into a single noun phrase improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: API 키 관리자는 이 {{productName}}의 모든 API 키를 확인 및 관리할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'API' is written as 'API යතුරු' which is technically correct, but a more common and accepted term would be 'API යතුරු'.
The phrase 'ඔබ හිමිකරුවකු/පරිපාලකයකු ලෙස' could be slightly more natural as 'ඔබ හිමිකරු/පරිපාලකයකු වශයෙන්'.
The variable {{productName}} is correctly included, but consistency in its formatting (uppercase/lowercase, brackets) should be verified across all translations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistency with {{productName}} formatting across all translated strings.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'у оквиру' sounds a little formal and could be simplified.  While grammatically correct, a more natural phrasing might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Као власник/администратор можете прегледати и управљати свим API кључевима у {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'керувати ними' is slightly awkward. A more natural translation for 'manage' in this context would be 'адмініструвати'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Як власник/адміністратор ви можете переглядати всі ключі API в цьому {{productName}} та адмініструвати їх.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "view and manage" is too literal. A more natural phrasing would be "查看和管理" instead of simply translating 'view' and 'manage' separately. The Chinese phrasing sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 作为所有者/管理员，您可以查看和管理此{{productName}}中的所有 API 密钥。
